channel.title: Softlayer_billing_payment_card_manualpayment on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_billing_payment_card_manualpayment on SoftLayer API

item.title: MakeAPayment.php
item.description: <?php /** * This script submits a request for manual payment. This kind of request are permitted at minimum amount of $2.00. * Customer may submit a Credit Card Payment (Mastercard, Visa, American Express or a PayPal payment). * * Important manual pages: * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Account/requestManualPayment * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ManualPayment * * @license <http://sldn.softlayer.com/wiki/index.php/license> * @author SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> */ require_once __DIR__.'/vendor/autoload.php'; /** * Your SoftLayer API username * @var string */ $username = "set me"; /** * Your SoftLayer API key * Generate one at: https://control.

item.title: PaymentMethod.php
item.description: <?php /** * This script retrieves the record data associated with the submission of a Credit Card Change Request. * If the onlyChangeNicknameFlag parameter is set to true, the nickname of the credit card will be changed * immediately without requiring approval by an agent. * * Important manual pages: * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Account/requestCreditCardChange * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ChangeRequest * * @license <http://sldn.softlayer.com/wiki/index.php/license> * @author SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> */ require_once __DIR__.'/vendor/autoload.php'; /** * Your SoftLayer API username * @var string */ $username = "set me"; /** * Your SoftLayer API key * Generate one at: https://control.

item.title: RequestManualPayment.php
item.description: <?php /** * Make a Payment * * This script makes a manual payment. Softlayer customers are permitted to request a manual * one-time payment at a minimum amount of $2.00. * * Important manual pages: * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Account/requestManualPayment * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ManualPayment * * @license <http://sldn.softlayer.com/article/License> * @author SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> */ require_once dirname(__FILE__) . "/SoftLayer/SoapClient.class.php"; /** * SoftLayer API username * @var string */ $username = 'set me'; /** * SoftLayer API key * @var string */ $apiKey = 'set me'; /** * Declare parameters for Payment Information * @var Decimal $amount */ $amount = 50.

item.title: RequestManualPaymentUsingCreditCardOnFile.php
item.description: <?php /** * This script makes a Manual Payment Request for a manual payment using a credit card which is on * file and does not require an approval process. * SoftLayer customers are permitted to request a manual one-time payment at a minimum amount of $2.00 * * Important manual pages: * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Account/requestManualPaymentUsingCreditCardOnFile * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ManualPayment * * @license <http://sldn.softlayer.com/article/License> * @author SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> */ require_once dirname(__FILE__) .

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ManualPayment
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ManualPayment Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ManualPayment data type contains general information relating to attempted credit card information changes. Local accountId The account ID to which the credit card and billing information is associated with. Type: integer amount The total amount of the attempted transaction, represented in decimal format as US Dollars ($USD). Type: decimal authorizedCreditCardTransactionId The unique identifier of an attempted credit card transaction.
